trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Columbia
There were no other sightings in Columbia on or around April 20th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing at my back door smoking a cig. when i looked up i saw a large green ball in the sky moving south. it moved slow but disappeared shortly over the hills. ive seen alot of things but nothing like that. it looked like a fireball with no tail and two colors of green. it was large in size and i waited to hear a crash sound but no sound was ever hear by it. was crazy seeing that thing!
